events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund for it as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund due to the request for returning a purchased product and money back.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service representative who will assist you with your refund request shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you would like to return your jacket and get a refund. I am here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the jacket is unworn and in its original condition for the refund process?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, still with tags attached and hasn't been worn outside.

Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process. Please send the jacket back using our prepaid return label, and once we receive it, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will ship it back today using the label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund to the original payment method. You should see the amount reflected in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund without any issues. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been successfully processed and no further concerns have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
